message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping for a more reasonable price. Could we discuss something closer to $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $150 represents a fair price given its value, I'm willing to come down to $130. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, could we discuss a price closer to $110?
